about_the_game:
Glass Horizon

Immerse yourself in the breathtaking world of "Glass Horizon," a first-person parkour game that challenges your agility and reflexes. As a skilled freerunner, you navigate through futuristic cities filled with gleaming skyscrapers and urban landscapes. Leap across gaps, overcome obstacles, and master challenging courses to complete your missions. Or just take in the cityscape with a calm nightrun.

Features

  • Immersive Parkour Experience: Enjoy relaxingly fluid and realistic movements.
  • Relax and Unwind: Enjoy a tranquil gaming experience with soothing environments and gentle gameplay for stress relief.
  • Embrace the Challenge: Seek out tougher quests and obstacles to push your skills and customize your experience.
  • Futuristic Setting: Explore impressive, modern cities and dive into a sci-fi atmosphere.
  • Visually Stunning: Enjoy breathtaking stylized graphics and a unique cityscape.

Conquer the Horizon

Get ready for the ultimate parkour experience in "Glass Horizon" and show the world what you're made of. Are you ready to conquer the horizon?
